WorkItem.Description: With an attack power of 19980, spell power of 10949 and tremendous tankard of terror in OH, I'm getting 285.8 dps from lava lash attacks.  The number of attacks per minute looks right (5.22) but that comes out to 3285 average dmg per LL.  This is off by a factor of 10 or more.  Total dps is way off as a result.
WorkItem.Summary: Rawr.Enhance Lava Lash simming too low in 4.3.2

Comments.Message: Yep, I definitely screwed up my last check-in related to the 4.3 flametongue change.  This is also related to the other issue with mastery being incredibly under-rated.
Found the problem and have fixed it.  Will be fixed for the next release.

I'm wondering...

float lavalashDPS = damageOHSwing * 2f * cs.HitsPerSLL

Should that 2f be 2.6f, now that LL does 260% dmg (312% with talent, but that's handled elsewhere) or am I missing something?
